title: Impact Double Breasted Jacket
body_html: Introducing the luxurious Impact Double Breasted Jacket. With its double-breasted design, this jacket exudes elegance and sophistication. The deep pockets not only add a touch of functionality but also provide a stylish statement. Made from luxurious crepe, it offers both comfort and style. The subtle elastic on the sleeve helps you when you need to roll up your sleeves.

The luxurious satin and a unique sleeve nuance add a touch of elegance to your power presence. Suit up and embrace the exclusive feel of this jacket.

body_html: Experience luxury and sophistication with our Artistry Lace Jacket for women. This exclusive, limited-edition piece is crafted from pristine crepe, making it a timeless addition to any wardrobe. Elevate your style and make a statement with this one-of-a-kind jacket.

title: Timeless Colorblock Sheath Dress
body_html: The sheath silhouette you love, now in season's favorite plum and barely pink. Cut from our signature crepe, the Timeles Sheath Dress contours the body without compromising on comfort. Featuring a sleevesless design, a centre-back zipper and V-neckline, the slim pencil silhouette is beautifully detailed: note the striking pleated slit detailing that gives the functionality of a slit without the exposure. it's wrinkle resistant and even machine washable, so you can skip the dry cleaners. Slip on with tonal or contrast footwear and you’ll be good to go from 9 to 9!

title: Eternal Double Breasted Jacket - Limited Edition
body_html:
Crafted from soft tweed the new Eternal double breasted jacket is here to infuse the everyday with a charming touch. The formal double-breasted design is offset by a playful pink and gold hue to ensure it’s as suited to the office as it is after-work events. Sharp tailoring and deep pockets speak to Point of View genesis, while meticulously placed seams create a modern silhouette. The subtle elastic on the sleeve helps you when you need to roll up your sleeves.
We’re styling ours with the Forever white trousers separates for an elegant look.

title: Pinnacle Stand Collar Detail Stretch Dress for Women
body_html: Effortlessly blending elegance and comfort, the Pinnacle Stretch Dress for women is a versatile wardrobe essential. Featuring a beautifully gathered bodice, delicate button details, and an asymmetrical stand collar, this dress is sophisticated enough for special occasions yet comfortable for long office hours. Crafted from machine-washable Lycra, it offers exceptional stretch and seamlessly returns to its original shape. Designed to fall just at the knee, this dress transitions effortlessly between seasons—perfect bare-legged for warmer days or paired with tights in cooler weather.

title: Forever Dress Pants for Women with Satin Piping
body_html:
Made from luxurious crepe, these wrinkle-resistant dress pants for women provide comfort and style for those long 9-9 workdays. The deep pockets and satin lining elevate the look, making these pants a must-have for any wardrobe. Woven for a mechanical stretch, they're ultra-comfortable and stay looking sharp throughout the day. Crisp pressed creases, belt loops and front pockets elevate the classic silhouette, while the waistband has an elasticated back for the perfect, comfortable fit. Wear with our Artistry jacket impactful and statement making work look.
Part of our Future Classics Collection: washable, breathable and crease-resistant, these flattering pieces form the foundation of a hard-working capsule loved by our customers season after season.

title: Catalyst Pocket Frill Formal Pants for Women
body_html:
Thought-Provoking. Powerful. Feel Good.
The Catalyst Pocket Frill formal pants for women are crafted with our signature crepe fabric that has mild mechanical stretch, and is crease-resistant. It features a long leg design for a sharp silhouette and an elegant stretchable waist for post lunch comfort. Finished with pocket frill detail on deep functional pockets the Catalyst trousers is the epitome of fuss-free tailoring – machine washable, sculpting and seriously luxurious.
The mid-waisted, slightly flared shape feels contemporary and looks flattering on everyone. Team with our navy Prodigy jacket.

title: Prodigy Neck Frill detail Crepe Jacket for Women
body_html: Introducing Prodigy, a luxurious yet thought provoking jacket for women with neck frill detailing and crepe fabric that moves with your body. This exquisitely crafted piece is perfect to elevate your look for any occasion. Sharp enough for a big day at work, it features an asymetrical frill and is designed to feel as elegant as it is irreverant. .A transitional must-have, pair with the matching navy Catalyst dress pants – this is chic modular suiting, done right.

title: Dynamic Double Sided Zipper Pencil Skirt for Women
body_html:
Witty. Impactful. Eccentric.
The Dynamic Skirt is a modern take on the classic pencil skirt for women with a dual tone look made of jute linen and satin. The perfect blend of form and function, this flattering knee length skirt features functional pockets that offer just the place to stash your phone. The two-way zipper detailing at the back allows for ease of movement by adjusting the length of the slit. Coordinated with the 'Inspiration' pink Flounce top or layered with the 'Imagination' jute linen jacket, it's perfect for making a bold office statement or delivering a keynote speech.

title: Ambition Crepe and Satin Pencil Skirt for Women
body_html:
Edgy. Cerebral. Elevated
Sleek pencil shape? Check. Stylish yet functional? Check. This sophisticated dual-tone Ambition pencil skirt for women is crafted from a combination of crepe and satin. The stylish asymmetric panel with a front slit and invisible zipper on the side makes this skirt as comfortable as it is flattering. Machine-washable, crease-resistant and fully lined making this a go-to skirt for a long day at work. Team it with our 'Inspiration' top for a day at work, or layer over the navy "Prodigy" jacket for a power profile.

title: Disruption Dual Tone Formal Pants for Women
body_html:
Unapologetic. Genre-defying. Irreverent.
Discover an exclusive look with the Disruption Dual Tone Crepe formal pants for women. Crafted from luxuriously soft crepe and satin these trousers feature a sophisticated dual-tone design. Combining contemporary wide-leg styling with four functional pockets and adjustable waist with hidden elastic, it will take you from laid-back days to dressy nights in effortless style.

title: Passion Relaxed Shift Dress
body_html: The Passion Relaxed Shift Dress is made for fans of the classic shift dress who also appreciate a bit of glamor. This easy go-to style features a crew neck with pleats and a gorgeous satin panel at the bottom. The dress features pockets for convenience and a relaxed fit thanks to its curve-friendly design, hemline that falls just above the knee and mild stretch. A minimalistic design that never goes out of style and gives you the sharp look you need for that important presentation at work.

title: Maverick Bow Detail Jacquard Top
body_html: Crafted from 100% machine-washable Viscose Jacquard, the Maverick top brings glamor to the boring workwear wardrobe. With a turtle neckline and a halter sash ending in a cute bow, this top is fun yet sophisticated. Ideal for night or day, the Maverick is perfect for a nine-to-nine kind of a day.

title: Resilience Sheath Dress
body_html: The Resilience Sheath Dress features blended pockets and is designed to take you from day to night in subtle sophistication. With its sheath silhouette, three-quarter length sleeves and back zip, it's both flattering and functional. Plus, the high neckline makes it the ideal canvas for endless accessories. Designed to put you in control in high stakes work situations with a no-nonsense broad belt while flattering the silhouette for that extra confidence.

title: Artistry Lace Power Suit for Women – White Jacket and Black Dress Pants Set
body_html:
Experience luxury and sophistication with our Artistry Lace Jacket Power Suit. This exclusive, limited-edition piece is crafted from pristine crepe, making it a timeless addition to any wardrobe. Elevate your style and make a statement with this one-of-a-kind power suit for women. 

This is a two-piece set of our customer favorite Artistry Lace Jacket in White and Forever Dress Pants in Black
